db:abstract.db:para: A QML app using Qt Quick Controls 2 and a C++ class that implements a simple contact list.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = contactlist QT += quick
HEADERS += \ contactmodel.h
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ contactmodel.cpp
RESOURCES += \ ContactDelegate.ui.qml \ ContactDialog.qml \ ContactForm.ui.qml \ contactlist.qml \ ContactView.ui.qml \ designer/Backend/ContactModel.qml \ SectionDelegate.ui.qml
# Additional import path used to resolve QML modules just for Qt Quick Designer QML_DESIGNER_IMPORT_PATH = $$PWD/designer
OTHER_FILES += \ designer/Backend/*.qml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols2/contactlist INSTALLS += target
